string:
In the meeting
room of a record
company…
Producer One is
reporting the
results of an
audition tape
made by a band
called the
Indies.

We heard your
songs.
<name>bThank you very
much.
<name>WAbout the result
… Mr. Meow, we
decided to hire
only you.
<name>YWait a minute!
I've been making
music with him
from the start.
There is no way
you can hire
only one of us!

<name>X… … … …

<name>WWell, it's all
up to you. Our
decision will
not change.

<noname><name>YDarn!!
<name>XGood for you…
<name>YWhat are you
saying!? We've
been together…

<name>XIt's your dream!
You always
wanted to become
famous and sing
in front of
large audiences
all around the
world!
<name>YBut…
<name>XI've been just
holding you up…
You're a star
and I've always
been jealous. My
guitar playing
is no good,
but you are
different.
You will be big
someday! Don't
worry about me.
Take their
offer…
<name>W… … … …
<name>Y…Alright,
Polo…

<noname><name>WMr. Meow. What
do you think?
<name>Y…Yes. I…
will do it!
<name>WGood. I'm glad
to hear that.

OK. Now the two
of you have to
try even harder
to make good
music!

<name>YWhat!? You
mean…?
<name>WYes. It was our
company's
decision to
hire both of
you!!

<name>bThank you very
much!!

<noname><name>W“It's your
dreams!”…
Those kids…
They're just
like me when I
was younger…
They will make
their dreams
come true…
unlike me…
someday…
